content: this all-purpose scarf design features captivating colorblocking and a brand new stitch pattern with detailed written instructions and helpful video tutorials to guide you through each step using luxurious cotton-merino fine yarn by concept by katia this scarf offers both warmth and elegance in one elevate your crochet skills with this versatile pattern ideal for adults looking to add a touch of handmade sophistication to their wardrobe **unique features-** unisex design suitable for teens and adults captivating and unique stitch pattern - created just for this scarf detailed written pattern and video tutorials for guidance luxurious cotton-merino fine yarn for warmth and elegance **materials needed-** hook 4 5mm us size 7 0 yarn cotton-merino fine https //tidd ly/4p4ussu dk weight 450 yards
